About

Zhou Jiajian work at Prof. Sun's lab as a Research Assistant in Department of Chemical Pathology, CUHK. He is also a M.Sc student of CUHK-BGI Innovation Institite of Trans-Omics, CUHK. He was a Bioinformatic Analyst in DEPT. of Social Evolution Research and Microbial Research Group, BGI shenzhen in 2010.4~2012.7. He got his B.Sc degree in Biotechnoloy from South China Agricultural University, GuangZhou, China. Now, his research is about bioinformatics, gene regulation in myogenesis, microbial genomics and NGS method for clinical diagnosis.

Research Interests

  • Long noncoding RNA research: reconstruct regulation network related to long nocoding RNA;
  • NGS method for clinical diagnosis: find biomarks for disease diagnosis;
  • Genome annotation: genome assembly, annotation and pathogen analysis(bacteria) base on NGS data.

Contact
